name: The Empire of Lights
description:
The Empire of Lights is a visual experiment inspired by a series of paintings drawn by René Magritte of the same name. In this game, you need to collect all the coins scattered throughout the world. To reveal their position, however, one must control the position of the sun.

Created for Global Game Jam 2016.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Hold the Left Shift to run
  • Move the mouse to look around
  • Hold E and move the mouse around to change the sun's position
Created in:
  • Engine: Unity
  • Graphics: A ton to name; see the game's credits.
  • Music: GarageBand
  • Sound Effects: Unity Standard Assets and BFXR
  • Font: Fira-Sans by Mozilla
